title: External Tools for Quick connect
author: LIyoai
body_snippet:
<!--

<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
I would like to start external tools for quick connection. Maybe with a dialog to fill in all needed variables for the command.

iterations.description: Issue body is empty with no description of what 'External Tools for Quick connect' means - needs clarification on whether this requests adding external tool launching from the Quick Connect toolbar, or something else entirely
